main event: A white light was observed passing the window twice in Malden, Massachusetts, with no reflection or sound.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 4 to 5 minutes., The object was described as a white light with no tail., The altitude of the object was impossible to determine., A letter requesting information regarding the sighting went unanswered., The weather was clear during the observation.
witness description: the observer saw the light through her window.
